channel.title: User Lifecycle Management (LCM) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: User Lifecycle Management (LCM) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: An overview of lifecycle management and why we care about it, or at least why Enterprise app vendors care about it, and what that means for developers who need to incorporate it. Add emphasis on user provisioning and deprovisioning in this doc.

item.title: SCIM
item.description: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: A high-level overview of SCIM and how it powers LCM. This is a rework of the current SCIM concept doc, that then provides links to the Build > Get Started > Create a SAML app integration > Build a SCIM App (ID: 781) and the Build > Manage User Accounts > Manage a Users Lifecycle > SCIM section (ID: 474)

item.title: SCIM with entitlements
item.description: SCIM with entitlements Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: An introductory overview of what entitlements are and how they extend SCIM Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic. Such high-level overviews provide developers with a broad understanding of the system’s workings.
